column1: #Text=Polycrystalline K2Cr8O16 used in the present study was
#Text=prepared by a high-pressure synthesis and characterized
#Text=for its crystal structure, electrical, and magnetic properties,
#Text=carried out at beamline BL29XU, SPring-8 using an
#Text=incident photon energy of hν ¼ 7935 eV and a spectrometer [32,33] equipped with a R-4000-10 kV VG-Scienta
#Text=The total energy resolution was set to 225 meV
#Text=performed at BL17SU, at SPring-8 using a GammadataScienta SES2002 hemispherical electron analyzer set to the
#Text=using the R4000WAL electron analyzer and a vacuumultraviolet laser (hν ¼ 6.994 eV, ΔE ¼ 5 meV at 10 K)
#Text=carried out in vacuum below 4 × 10−8 Pa, and clean sample surfaces were obtained by cleaving in situ at low T.
#Text=spectra were calibrated using the EF measured from a gold
#Text=measurements were carried out using a liquid He flowtype cryostat and were checked for reproducibility on T
